name: Bomber run (mearlam)
description:
There is not much to this game and I am about to abandon it as I don't find it fun. I don't like to see it go to waste though, so I put it here any way.

When you get to the other side of the screen you will turn around and more enemies will spawn. 

You cannot actually win this game, it will go on forever.

Controls

Drop bomb - left mouse, enter on keyboard or touch screen
